message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its immense potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $900,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $875,000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
